data.title: MPI-Defrost: Extension of Defrost to MPI-based Cluster Environment
data.name: defrost-mpi
data.description: MPI version of the defrost code

evidence: "MPI version of the defrost code (by Valery Frolov) for parametric resonance preheating calculations" indicates a scientific simulation/analysis code used directly for research calculations.

"This version of the code is likely to be purely archival at this point ... but is uploaded for completeness" suggests it is shared as source in a repository rather than via a package manager or binaries.
The repository is a standalone codebase (no mention of libraries or packaging), implying it is run as an application rather than imported as a dependency.
